title: Kimagure Orange☆Road: Ano Hi ni Kaeritai
title_jp: きまぐれオレンジ★ロード　あの日にかえりたい
synopsis: After the TV-series of Kimagure Orange Road, Kyosuke and Madoka have finally arrived at the point where they are close to graduation and have to decide where they want to go to college. Naturally, they want to go together, so beside all the studying they also have to look for a proper college where they can enter both.
